    Class
    Description
    class 
    Student
    Student is the class that models the student pieces, it changes its color attribute according to the game rules

    Teacher
    Teacher is the class that models the concept of teacher in the game, its possible colors are the same as students one

    Tower
    Tower models the tower piece in the game, it inherits color attribute and changes it according to tower piece color in the game
